about_the_game:
The newest entry in the popular Inspirational series rounds out the packs with a variety of themes with an ambient and funky undertone.

Composed by JDB Artist, Inspirational Vol. 4 is a fantastic addition to your music library. Whether you're looking for a modern tune with personality or a more classic fantasy piece, this pack is a must-have!

This pack contains:

  • 37 BGM tracks.
  • Covers a variety of situations and moods.
  • In .M4A and .OGG format.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

1 - Bad Party
2 - Battle Storm
3 - Beach City
4 - Beach
5 - Boss Matters
6 - Confrontation
7 - Crimson Crisis
8 - Dreamers
9 - Dungeon
10 - Journey Ahead

28 - Echelon Signal
29 - Far Away

31 - Horizon

33 - Rain

37 - You See it All

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Inspirational Vol. 4

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: RPG Maker MV - Inspirational Vol. 4 - $24.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Inspirational Vol. 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: The newest entry in the popular Inspirational series rounds out the packs with a variety of themes with an ambient and funky undertone
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
